rules_text:
Draw a card.
Create a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token.
Draw a card for each artifact card in your graveyard and each artifact card in exile you own.
special_text:
[+1]: Draw a card.
[-1]: Create a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token.
[-6]: Draw a card for each artifact card you own among cards in your graveyard and in exile.
